summary:
An experienced TP professional with over 10 years of experience in managing TP projects for large multinational companies from various industries, including oil & gas, chemicals, telecommunications, IT, FMCG, logistics, automotive, and pharmaceuticals. 

Skilled in leading global TP projects, managing cross-functional teams, and delivering expert advice on TP matters. Proven ability to tackle complex TP issues and provide practical, actionable solutions.

[{'company': {'id': 165806, 'name': 'SABIC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQE6KBvgsKE1jA/company-logo_400_400/0/1548079538184?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=vXJ2MwPtIKGAdb7sCEntMF324SMLRg7Kf1QhkjeyaAM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/sabic/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'SABIC', 'description': None, 'title': 'Global Transfer Pricing', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1073, 'name': 'EY', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQGpRhkpxp5A9A/company-logo_400_400/0/1561962168715?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=2XXtIwvyoU-JRPHXPNsuavc3eNpQj1bdsQWU8vVx5Ec', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ernstandyoung/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rotterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'EY', 'description': '• Managing TP projects for foreign and Dutch multinational companies from various industries, including IT, telecommunication, FMCG, industry products, logistics, oil&gas, etc.
• Examples of TP projects:
- Leading and coordinating global TP documentation projects involving several jurisdictions.
- Development of a profit split methodology for a multinational group operating in the logistics industry.
- Addressing TP aspects of business restructurings (transfer of IP, valuation, exit tax).
- Assisting with TP audits and addressing questions from tax authorities.
- Development of TP policies relating to the provision of intra-group services (including cost allocation, benefit test, etc.).
- Involvement in audit and due diligence projects to perform a TP review.
- Various compliance related projects (CbCR, Master File, Local File, benchmark studies, DAC6).
• Assignment to work from client’s premises (in-house experience eq.) in relation to the design and implementation of an operating model (including profit split, IP licensing, intra-group services, etc.). The client is one of the largest MNEs operating in the IT/telecommunication industry.
• Assistance in developing a TP team and market in the Southern region of the Netherlands.', 'title': 'Manager, Transfer Pricing & Operating Model Effectiveness', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Moscow, Russia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'EY', 'description': '• Managing TP projects for foreign and Russian multinational companies from various industries, including FMCG, oil&gas, telecommunication, chemical, automotive, and pharmaceutical.
• Experience in managing (including leading functional analysis meetings, running day-to-day client relationships, managing engagement economics and participation in proposal activity) the following types of TP projects:
- significant engagement for a company operating in the chemical sector involving development of a group wide TP policy,
- development of a cost allocation mechanism for a centralized service centre of a Russian parented mining group.
- numerous compliance based projects (i.e. preparation of TP documentation, benchmarking studies, etc.),
• Experience in working in collaboration with other SLs (Audit and Advisory teams), other SSLs (ITS, BTS, VAT) and other colleagues from foreign offices.
• Leading (under supervision of the Partner) the “operation efficiency” group which contributes in development of tools, processes and templates used in local TP practice.
• Assistance in coordination and development of TP center of excellence.
• Local champion for development of global benchmarking tool and global TP documentation tool.
• Regular coaching of junior staff.
• Course trainer for locally run TP training for advanced staffs from across the CIS.', 'title': 'Manager, Transfer Pricing & Operating Model Effectiveness', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Moscow, Russia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'EY', 'description': '• Assisted in managing the following types of TP projects:
- preparation of TP documentations,
- performance of benchmarking studies (including benchmarking studies for financial transactions and transactions involving commodities and IP),
- development of TP methodologies for the two companies from oil&gas industry and one company from real estate industry.
• Contribution to the development of the TP group’s tools, and working process.
• Participation as a tutor in a number of clients seminars.
• Experience in working with the following databases: RUSLANA, SPARK, AMADEUS, PowerK, Bloomberg, and Thomson Reuters.
• Managing Russian comparable databases, including communication with database providers.
• Publication of 4 articles on TP topics in Russian industry publications.
• Presentated the external and internal TP training events.', 'title': 'Senior Consultant, Transfer Pricing & Operating Model Effectiveness', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1044, 'name': 'PwC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQGv_22548SaOQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1689197046877?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=ExPap1fji47kUzWW6Ci2VT3UwRDJfap4xCJPT4J8ZOc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/pwc/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Moscow, Russia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'PwC', 'description': '• Participation in various TP projects with the following responsibilities:
- research of technical information, performance of company and industry analysis,
- involvement in client meetings,
- drafting functional analysis,
- drafting consulting letters,
- preparation of benchmarking studies (including financial and IP transactions),
- preparing TP documentations,
- preparing commercial proposals.
• Participation as a tutor in internal technical learning sessions.
• Experience in working with the following databases: RUSLANA, SPARK, AMADEUS, Bloomberg, and RoyaltyStat.', 'title': 'Consultant, Transfer Pricing & Tax Efficient Supply Chain Management', 'employment_type': None}]}]
